actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no individual shall pay an income tax of less than 10 Percent of his net income which exceeds $30,000 for any taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require a minimum income tax of ten percent of individual net income which exceeds $30,000 for any taxable year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that no individual shall pay an income tax of less than 10 Percent of his net income which exceeds $30,000 for any taxable year.
